price: Akitaka atakuondoeni na alete viumbe vipya.
arabic: إِن يَشَأۡ يُذۡهِبۡكُمۡ وَيَأۡتِ بِخَلۡقٖ جَدِيدٖ
footnotes: Mwenyezi Mungu akitaka kukuteketezeni, basi atakuteketezeni kwa utimilivu wa uweza wake. Na alete uumbaji mpya utao ridhiana na hikima yake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: in yasha yudh'hib'kum wayati bikhalqin jadīdin
